channel.title: [317] *BS* >>RadiusX<< [317]
channel.description:
Hello guys, RadiusX is going to be based off the amazing, BattleScape!
Now, I chose BattleScape because Pali wrote the Combat System (: , I love PvPing and Pali has the best Combat System known to RSPS if you ask me... =)
-[i][b]Staff/Coder Requirements[/b][/i]- -Familiar with the DropBox.com Software... (Allows people to edit the same file without transfering the file) -Ability to code 317, OldSchool Servers.
-[b]Pictures[/b]-
Uploading Pictures Soon. Just got started, needs lots of work. (Pm me for client, ip, and other details needed to get started) You will gimme your application in-game. Thanks, Radius.
